types:type.name: customers_json
types:type.types:shape: %dw 2.0 type customers_json = Array<{| customerId: String, email: String, fullName: String, phoneNumber: String, addressLine1: String, addressLine2: String, city: String, state: String, pincode: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}> {"MetadataFormat": "json", "example": "[{\"customerId\":\"AXYZ123\",\"email\":\"something@gmail.com\",\"fullName\":\"MS Dhoni\",\"phoneNumber\":\"+91-9988998899\",\"addressLine1\":\"49, 1st Floor\",\"addressLine2\":\"RM Nagar\",\"city\":\"Bangalore\",\"state\":\"Karnataka\",\"pincode\":560016},{\"customerId\":\"AXYZ124\",\"email\":\"somethingelse@gmail.com\",\"fullName\":\"V Kohli\",\"phoneNumber\":\"+91-9987658899\",\"addressLine1\":\"50, 2nd Floor\",\"addressLine2\":\"RM Nagar\",\"city\":\"Bangalore\",\"state\":\"Karnataka\",\"pincode\":560016}]"}
